celestial_lord.name: Celestial Lord
celestial_lord.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.

celestial_lord_lizard.name: Celestial Lord on Dragon-Lizard
celestial_lord_lizard.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.

celestial_lord_dragon.name: Celestial Lord on Starborn Drake
celestial_lord_dragon.description: A warrior mage, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.

celestial_lord_chariot.name: Celestial Lord on Stormforged Chariot
celestial_lord_chariot.description: A warrior mage driving a heavy chariot, blessed in the eye of a storm with magical weapons.

reliquary_lord.name: Reliquary Lord
reliquary_lord.description: Shrouded in misteries, this warrior priest watches over the souls of the fallen.

reliquary_lord_soul.name: Reliquary Lord with Soul Casket
reliquary_lord_soul.description: Shrouded in misteries, this warrior priest casts down the wrath of the stars to avenge the fallen.

lightning_mage.name: Stormcaller Mage
lightning_mage.description: A mighty lightning mage, capable of hailing down magical storms onto their foes.

lightning_mage_on_celestial_beast.name: Stormcaller Mage on Greater Celestial Beast
lightning_mage_on_celestial_beast.description: A mighty lightning mage on a celestial beast, charging into the fray with steel and spell.

models.name: Stormcaller Mage on Greater Celestial Beast

lightning_mage_on_gryhpon.name: Stormcaller Mage on Gryphon
lightning_mage_on_gryhpon.description: A mighty lightning mage on a hardy gryphon mount, swooping down on his foes.

stormwing_lord.name: Stormwing Lord
stormwing_lord.description: A mighty warrior mage, held aloft by enchanted wings and harnessing the powers of the elements.

lightning_mage_chariot.name: Stormcaller Mage on Stormforged Chariot
lightning_mage_chariot.description: A mighty lightning mage, capable of hailing down magical storms onto their foes.

celestial_beast.name: Celestial Beast
celestial_beast.description: A loyal companion from the Star realm, swift and wielding deadly claws.

celestial_beast_leader.name: Celestial Beast Leader
celestial_beast_leader.description: A loyal pack leader from the Star realm, swift and wielding deadly claws.

stormforged_warrior.name: Stormforged Warriors
stormforged_warrior.description: A mighty Warrior in heavy armor who crushes their foes with the might of a storm.

stormforged_warrior_leader.name: Stormforged Warrior Leader
stormforged_warrior_leader.description: A mighty Leader in heavy armor who crushes their foes with the might of a storm.

stormforged_archer.name: Stormforged Archer
stormforged_archer.description: A mighty Warriors in heavy armor who overwhelms their foes with a flurry of arrows.

stormforged_archer_leader.name: Stormforged Archer Leader
stormforged_archer_leader.description: A mighty Leader in heavy armor who overwhelms their foes with a flurry of arrows.

stormforged_crossbow.name: Stormforged Arbalester
stormforged_crossbow.description: A mighty Warriors in heavy armor who strikes down on their foes like lightning.

stormforged_crossbow_leader.name: Stormforged Arbalester Leader
stormforged_crossbow_leader.description: A mighty Leader in heavy armor who strikes down on their foes like lightning.

invoker.name: Invoker
invoker.description: A warrior mage who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

invoker_leader.name: Invoker Leader
invoker_leader.description: A warrior mage leader who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

invoker_lizard.name: Invoker on Dragon-Lizard
invoker_lizard.description: A warrior mage on dragon-lizard who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

invoker_lizard_leader.name: Invoker Leader on Dragon-Lizard
invoker_lizard_leader.description: A warrior mage leader on dragon-lizard who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

invoker_celestial_beast.name: Invoker on Greater Celestial Beast
invoker_celestial_beast.description: A warrior mage on celestial beast who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

invoker_celestial_beast_leader.name: Invoker Leader on Greater Celestial Beast
invoker_celestial_beast_leader.description: A warrior mage leader on celestial beast who channels the power of lightning to burn their enemies and block ranged attacks.

models.name: Invoker Leader on Greater Celestial Beast

protector.name: Protector
protector.description: A veteran Warrior in heavy armor who infuses their great-weapon with elemental magic.

protector_leader.name: Protector Leader
protector_leader.description: A veteran Leader in heavy armor who infuses their great-weapon with elemental magic.

protector_lizard.name: Protector on Dragon-Lizard
protector_lizard.description: A veteran Warrior on dragon-lizard, smiting their foes with elemental attacks.

protector_lizard_leader.name: Protector Leader on Dragon-Lizard
protector_lizard_leader.description: A veteran Leader on dragon-lizard, smiting their foes with elemental attacks.

heavy_protector.name: Heavy Protector
heavy_protector.description: A veteran Warrior with the heaviest equipment, tasked with shattering the foe at all cost.

heavy_protector_leader.name: Heavy Protector Leader
heavy_protector_leader.description: A veteran Leader with the heaviest equipment, tasked with shattering the foe at all cost.

warden.name: Warden
warden.description: A veteran Warrior in heavy armor who has sworn to protect their mighty leaders.

warden_leader.name: Warden Leader
warden_leader.description: A veteran Warrior in heavy armor who has sworn to protect their mighty leaders.

stormwing.name: Stormwing
stormwing.description: A warrior mage, held aloft by enchanted wings and harnessing the powers of the elements.

stormwing_leader.name: Stormwing Leader
stormwing_leader.description: A warrior mage, held aloft by enchanted wings and harnessing the powers of the elements.

storm_chariot.name: Stormforged Chariot
storm_chariot.description: A powerful chariot driven by Wardens to harry flanks and break formations.

storm_chariot_leader.name: Stormforged Chariot Leader
storm_chariot_leader.description: A powerful chariot driven by Leaders to harry flanks and break formations.

dragon_rider.name: Dragon Guard
dragon_rider.description: A powerful warrior mage that has tamed a ferocious starborn drake, bringing judgement from above to the forces of evil.

dragon_rider_leader.name: Dragon Guard Leader
dragon_rider_leader.description: A powerful warrior mage leader that has tamed a ferocious starborn drake, bringing judgement from above to the forces of evil.

celestial_beast_skirmisher.name: Skirmisher on Greater Celestial Beast
celestial_beast_skirmisher.description: A swift warrior mage who can cover their enemies in hails of bolts whilst evading their attacks.

celestial_beast_skirmisher_leader.name: Skirmisher Leader on Greater Celestial Beast
celestial_beast_skirmisher_leader.description: A swift warrior mage leader who can cover their enemies in hails of bolts whilst evading their attacks.

celestial_beast_protector.name: Protector on Greater Celestial Beast
celestial_beast_protector.description: A personal Honorguard on celestial beast, striking their enemies with elemental weapons.

celestial_beast_protector_leader.name: Protector Leader on Greater Celestial Beasts
celestial_beast_protector_leader.description: A personal Honorguard Leader on celestial beast, striking their enemies with elemental weapons.

models.name: Protector Leader on Greater Celestial Beast

star_drake.name: Starborn Drake
star_drake.description: A ferocious dragon of astral descent, burning their enemies to ashes.

star_drake_hero.name: Ascended Starborn Drake
star_drake_hero.description: A wise and ancient dragon of astral descent, leading an army into battle.

eye_of_the_storm.name: Eye of the Storm
eye_of_the_storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" has -1" movement and adds 1 to hit rolls against it.

hurricane_armor.name: Hurricane Armor
hurricane_armor.description: Target a friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, each time that unit rolls a 1 or 2 on a save roll, the attacking unit takes 1 hit with AP(3). This power may be cast unlimited times.

thunder_strike.name: Thunderbolt
thunder_strike.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes an automatic hit with AP(3) and Lethal.

eternal_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" and this unit receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ 
 * Re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+
eternal_tactics.name: Eternal Tactics

lightning_field.description: Roll a D10 each time this unit is hit by a Shooting attack. On each roll of a 1 or 2 one attack is prevented.
lightning_field.name: Lightning Field

soul_lantern.description: Once per round, a friendly _Infantry_ unit within 6" gains +1 AP on all Melee weapons.
soul_lantern.name: Soul Lantern

strategies.description: Use this strategy when one of your units is targeted by an attack. Roll a die for each hit, on a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
strategies.flavor: The Storm Wardens wear enchanted armor, absorbing the force of enemy attacks, rendering them harmless
strategies.name: Stormshroud Armor

strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in _Ambush Reserves_ instead of deployed on the field.
strategies.flavor: Raining down from the sky like thunderstrikes, the Storm Wardens use magical portals to strike from behind enemy lines.
strategies.name: Stormstrike Portals

strategies.description: Use when a unit is targeted by a Fight action. If that unit has not yet activated, it may perform a Defensive Stance reaction without testing Initiative.
strategies.flavor: Any foe foolish enough to strike a Storm Warden will feel the wrath of a thousand storms.
strategies.name: Counter Attack
